citations.narrative:
* The last recorded date of heartworm and fecal float testing for 23 dogs was 6/24/22. The Program of Veterinary Care
states that this licensee must test 10 % of the dogs in the facility for heartworm disease and fecal testing every year.
Parasite testing according to the sampling plan outlined by the attending veterinarian in the Program of Veterinary care is
important for the health of the animals. Heartworm and fecal float testing are done to ensure that there are no internal
parasites. Heartworms are serious parasites that are transmitted by mosquito bites. The licensee must ensure that a
sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including fleas, worms, coccidia, giardia, and heartworm) must be
done in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian. Correct by 11/30/23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
* The last recorded date of heartworm and fecal float testing for 23 dogs was 6/24/22. The Program of Veterinary Care 
states that this licensee must test 10 % of the dogs in the facility for heartworm disease and fecal testing every year. 
Parasite testing according to the sampling plan outlined by the attending veterinarian in the Program of Veterinary care is 
important for the health of the animals. Heartworm and fecal float testing are done to ensure that there are no internal 
parasites. Heartworms are serious parasites that are transmitted by mosquito bites. The licensee must ensure that a 
sampling and treatment of parasites and other pests (including fleas, worms, coccidia, giardia, and heartworm) must be 
done in accordance with a schedule approved by the attending veterinarian. Correct by 11/30/23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
